room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We had a great time doing the Bank Heist room. There were 4 of us and that was plenty but I could totally see it being more fun with more people. Morgan was great at giving us clues when we needed them. The bank room was challenging yet a lot of fun. I would definitely go back if I lived in the area.

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: This was our first escape room and it was so much fun! The staff was fantastic! We did Western Bank Heist and had an absolute blast! We want to go back for the Submarine!

room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Escape the Room Denver in Denver
review: We loved the room. We did the bank heist!! It was fabulous. It was difficult but we managed to escape. The gals running the place were very professional. We will be back. So many rooms to try!!
